Jogo incrível,
O jogo consegue ser difícil, divertido e encantador.
Em nenhum momento a gameplay se torna repetitiva, sempre inovando e tentando te impressionar a cada minuto,
Com variedades de arma e também variedade de gameplay, sendo assim um novo conceito de FPS e não so atirar e andar.

Это просто замечательная игра! Достойное продолжение первой части. Здесь и хороший сюжет, и классная графика, и просто восхитительный геймплей. В Half-Life 2 присутствует большой выбор оружия и по пути прохождения игры, вы будете пользоваться каждым из предоставляемых орудий. Лично мне игра больше всего понравилась в моменте, когда Фримен сражался вместе со своими друзьями [spoiler]муравьями[/spoiler] :) В игре постоянно происходит смена событий, благодаря чему, играть всегда интересно. Единственный минус, который меня смутил, это иногда непонятность куда идти. Но на фоне всего остального, это просто придирка. Рекомендую проходить на самом высоком уровне сложности, это заставит вас ценить каждый патрон. Советую эту игру однозначно каждому уважающему себя геймеру :)

Vou confirmar o que todos (que já compraram o jogo é claro) sempre falam sobre este jogo: Um clássico da Valve como todos os outros jogos dela, os gráficos são muito bons considerando a época que esse jogo foi produzido, ele roda em qualquer computador ou laptop, história muito envolvente e trilha sonora ajuda bastante na imersão da história. Espero muito pelo Half Life 3 kk

I made a review for this game last year while it was free for a limited time, but a few months ago I bought the game and sat down and played and beat it and now I can definitively say this game is the best fps game ever made. The gameplay is really fun, and it opens up even more once you get your hands of the gravity gun. The story is really engaging too, it was such a good design decision to make the player able do pick up props and do whatever during story moments, it made it way more fun during second playthroughs. I love this game so damn much I learnt how to speedrun it.

anyway buy this game.
10/10

This whole series is great. I really need part 3 but damn we've been waiting forever for this shit. At this point it's like I won't believe it until I have it in my hand. Getting back on track this series is absolutely amazing and I love how it ties in with Portal and how Portal does the same. The story line is well thought out and is absolutely amazing. 10/10 one of the best games of all time. You can never go wrong with Valve.

Half-Life 2

Half-Life just never gets old. Not many games feel as satisfying. Assuming the role of Gordan Freeman. Crowbar-weilding, alien-zombie-smashing MIT-superbrain ... doing some science only the side, really. Nice graphics (although they are obviously a little outdated by now), and great story - they don't make games like that anymore ;)

Super fun game. I really appreciate the perfect blend of old and new for this game after coming from HL1/Opposing Force/Blue Shift. For sure one of those games you want to play blind without knowing much of what's ahead!

Half Life 2 continues the premium game experience from Black Mesa, with Gordon Freeman brought back from stasis by the mysterious G-Man. Stunning atmosphere that keeps you at the edge of your seat along with some well-placed jump scares, be on guard! Gameplay is just as difficult as it needs to be and story progression is just challenging enough (although some of the bigger maps can be a bit confusing). Overall, a stunning game. Among the best I've played. Dammit Lamarr!
